moving

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • moving.Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Boss1, Boss1Mine, Chaser, Enemy3, Gavin, IcicleDropper, TestEnemy, UFO

    public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
    The default enemy. Controls enemy actions, movement, and drawing. Classes that extend this class can be made into custom enemies (such as Boss1.java).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(java.lang.String name,
     int x,
     int y,
     java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Double> drops,
     java.awt.Image img)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - Enemy's name.
        x - The x-position of the enemy on the map.
        y - The y-position of the enemy on the map.
        drops - A HashMap that represents the drops of the enemy (Item, and the chance of it dropping from the enemy once the enemy dies.)
        img - The Image of the Enemy.

        public boolean updateEnemy(Game myGame)

        Parameters:
        myGame - A copy of the current Game.
        Returns:
        Whether the enemy is dead (true) or not (false)

        public int getLevel()

        The level of the enemy.
